author: hlship
msg: Change MessageFormatter to automatically convert Throwable instances into their message, or their class name.

author: hlship
msg: Move the site target from forrest.xml to project.xml.

author: hlship
msg: Split out nearly all the messages from HiveMindStrings.properties into package specific strings files.
Change the singatures of the MethodMatcher and related filters to use a MethodSignature.
Remove the <description> element and update the XSL to use nested character data as the description.

author: hlship
msg: Split out many messages out of HiveMindMessages.properties and into per-package properties files (more to come).
Begin excising location-related portions of messages (as location reporting is a function of the ErrorHandler).
